bgibbons.game.graphics

Class Screen

  • java.lang.Object
    • bgibbons.game.graphics.Screen

  • public class Screen
extends java.lang.Object
    The screen object to be displayed to the user.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Screen

        public Screen(int width,
              int height,
              SpriteSheet sheet)
        Constructor object for the Screen object.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the screen.
        height - Height of the screen.
        sheet - Sprite sheet to be used.

    • Method Detail

      • setOffset

        public void setOffset(int xOffset,
                      int yOffset)
        Sets the offset of the screen based on the player and level.
        Parameters:
        xOffset - Offset in the x direction to be used.
        yOffset - Offset in the y direction to be used.

      • render

        public void render(int xPos,
                   int yPos,
                   int tile,
                   int color,
                   int mirrorDir,
                   int scale)
        Renders to the screen.
        Parameters:
        xPos - Starting x position to render to.
        yPos - Starting y position to render to
        tile - Tile from the sprite sheet to render to the screen.
        color - Color obtained from the Color.get(int, int, int, int) function.
        mirrorDir - An integer value for how the sprite tile is to mirrored (0x00 where first digit is x mirror, second is y mirror).
        scale - Scale of the sprite to be rendered.
